synopsis.text: He used to be the center of his parents' universe, but now, four-year-old Kun finds himself grappling with the arrival of his new baby sister, Mirai. Amidst the chaos of new experiences and feelings, Kun stumbles upon a magical garden that serves as a gateway to the past and future. Through a series of extraordinary encounters with his family members at different stages of their lives, including an older version of Mirai, Kun embarks on a transformative journey of self-discovery. As he navigates through time and space, he learns the true meaning of family and the role he must embrace as the older brother. Prepare for a heartwarming adventure that will leave you pondering the importance of growth and acceptance in this enchanting tale of sibling rivalry and love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
